Class CollectArgsDialog

java.lang.Object

                      com.xtructure.xevolution.gui.components.CollectArgsDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CollectArgsDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

CollectArgsDialog is a JDialog that automatically formats a form for user input from a Collection of XOptions.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Indicates whether collection of user input was successful.
